name: ruxit
description: Cloud-native monitoring powered by artificial intelligence
postInstallNotes:
Thank you for installing Dynatrace Ruxit on DCOS.
Log in to your Dynatrace Ruxit account at https://login.ruxit.com and monitor your DCOS cluster.
postUninstallNotes:
Dynatrace Ruxit has been uninstalled from DCOS and will no longer run.
.
preInstallNotes:
Pass your environment ID (ruxit.environment) and token (ruxit.token) as package options.
Also pass the number of Mesos slaves as an option (ruxit.instances).
Marathon will make sure that the Ruxit Agent runs only once per slave.
By default Marathon will allcoate 0.1 CPU and 128m memory per Ruxit Agent task.
